did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Scott County (Va.) List of Free Negroes and Mulattoes within the North District, 1832

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Scott County (Va.) List of Free Negroes and Mulattoes within the North District, 1832. Local government records collection, Scott County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 37303.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Scott County was formed in 1814 from Lee, Russell, and Washington counties.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Scott County (Va.) List of Free Negroes and Mulattoes within the North District, 1832. Consists of a list of all free negroes and mulattoes in the northern district of Scott County on June 1, 1832, with name, gender, place of abode, and trade, occupation, or calling. Listed are Edward Grills of Rye Cove; William Grunway, of Purchase; Samuel Pitman, of Copper Ridge; Robert Pitman, of Clinch River; Peggy Barney, of Rye Cove; and Nancy Barney, of Rye Cove.
